activities: Personal data is collected from customers in-store and online including through our websites, mobile applications, online tools and from our business partners connected to this policy in an effort to facilitate customer transactions, improve the customer shopping experience and to communicate with customers about our products, services, contests and promotions. We may also collect information from or about our service providers in the course of our business transactions.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data.  Data does not include manually processed data.
